articles.title: Burden of diabetes and hyperglycaemia in adults in the Americas, 1990–2019: a systematic analysis for the Global Burden of Disease Study 2019 - The Lancet
articles.description:
The burden of diabetes in the Americas is large, increasing, heterogeneous, and expanding.
To confront the rising burden, population-based interventions aimed to reduce type
